column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Deep dish pizzas can be a hefty meal.  Not Lou Malnati's pizza.  I can say
column3: that this is the best deep dish pizza.  It's not too doughy
column4: and it is just the right amount of saucy!  The crust was incredible!  When it comes to pizza
column5: I"m all about the crust.  To me
column7: but Lou Malnati's crust is PHENOMENAL!
